channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Elon Musk Could Be in Line for a $1 Trillion Tesla Pay Package
item.description: Tesla said in a regulatory filing that the package includes awards for Musk if targets are met over 10 years.
